answerText: Drosophila melanogaster [or D. melanogaster][10] This species of worm was used to study apoptosis by Sydney Brenner. Martin Chalfie transfected them with GFP.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 8 | 12 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Identify these model organisms,  [10] Thomas Hunt Morgan used these insects to study mutagenesis. They have four chromosomes and can be crossbred with balancer lines to maintain mutations.
